requirements.scenario: Verify that a user can successfully fill out the student registration form with valid data

test_steps.step: Enter valid first name
Enter valid last name
Enter valid email address
Select gender as Male
Enter valid mobile number
Select valid date of birth
Select subjects
Select hobbies as Sports and Reading
Upload a valid picture
Enter valid current address
Select state as California and city as Los Angeles
Click on Submit button

requirements.scenario: Verify that validation messages are displayed for each field when submitting the form with invalid data

test_steps.step: Submit the form without entering first name
Submit the form without entering last name
Submit the form without entering email
Submit the form without selecting gender
Submit the form without entering mobile number
Submit the form without selecting date of birth
Submit the form without selecting any subjects
Submit the form without selecting any hobbies
Submit the form without uploading a picture
Submit the form without entering current address
Submit the form without selecting state and city
